General_Description: '''War Eagle''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Riddle: ''Here on the isle of [[Salamis]], a great [[Ajax|warrior]]'s legacy is remembered. Take the road south and look for a [[Ruined Sanctuary of Ajax|ruined sanctuary]]. I can be found in its vicinity on a statue of an [[eagle]].''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra found and recovered the engraving.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
